On A Mission To Build A True Diversity Pipeline For Financial Services

Feb 1, 2019

Greenwood Project was started three years ago by Bevon and Elois Joseph. Since its launch, Greenwood has grown exponentially. Greenwood’s mission is to give a minority population exposure to financial-sector jobs. Thank you to the Illinois Board of Examiners for featuring Greenwood Project in its latest bulletin.

Written by
 
Bevon Joseph
